txt.en: 'It seems I shall need to rely on your protection now, [placeholder]! Glad to have you! I'm afraid we're going to have to fight our way through the entire band of criminals to get to their leader, Skótmun. The warehouse is east of here, by the docks. Let's go!'
'Ugh... fine. You win. Let's go see Dagrun.'
TBD
TBD
Find the smugglers' hideout
'Let me think, I'm fairly sure your mother told it to me last night...'
Defeat the Smuggler Guard
The door is guarded by a shady-looking ruffian
'No password, no entry! Get out of here!'
Talk to Dagrun
Seize the smugglers' leader, Skótmun
'That's it! You're dead!'
The smugglers' hideout can be found in the Lake-town underbelly.\n\nYou should find the smugglers' hideout.
'I'm glad we could finally convince you.'
'Oh, that's rich. You really think the two of you can take down all of this?! You're welcome to try!'
The smugglers' hideout can be found in the Lake-town underbelly.\n\nYou should seize the smugglers' leader, Skótmun.
Dagrun can be found in the Trade Commission Headquarters.\n\nYou should talk to Dagrun.
TBD
No password needed!
The Smugglers' Den
'Skótmun! By order of Dagrun, Captain of the Market, you are under arrest!'
Skótmun will be taken to Dagrun for questioning
'Who are you, then? No password, no entry.'
'You're tougher than you look!'
The evidence points to the Lake-town Smugglers being involved in the Master's murder. Storm their hideout, and bring in their leader for questioning!
TBD
The smugglers' hideout can be found in the Lake-town underbelly.\n\nYou should talk to the door guard.
Talk to the door guard
'Thanks to you, I finally have my prize, Skótmun. The Lake-town Smugglers are finished!'
TBD
